product_name: Clement Crusade PDX Cyclocross Foldable Tire - 700 x 33
long_description: An all-around performer with a particular love for mud, the Clement Crusade PDX Cyclocross foldable bike tire boasts a tuned tread for great traction on your crusades over barriers and through mud. Tread pattern features center knobs that are aligned for fast-rolling performance on hardpack and pavement; side knobs deliver excellent cornering control. Supple 120 tpi casing conforms easily to terrain for optimal traction. Crusade PDX Cyclocross tire is named after the Cross Crusade cyclocross race series in Portland, Oregon.
short_description: An all-around performer with a particular love for mud, the Clement Crusade PDX Cyclocross foldable bike tire boasts a tuned tread for great traction on your crusades over barriers and through mud.
